page.title: 14Moreton Say C.E.School
page.content: The school was built in 1871. In 1960 a kitchen and toilets were built on, and in 1973 the infants classroom was erected in the playground. In 1982 oil fired central heating was installed. There are 3 classrooms, a dining room, a kitchen, toilets, playgrounds and a playing field. The 45 children aged from 5 to 11 are divided into 2 classes, 24 in the infant class and 21 in the junior class. The school is situated near the church. There are 2.1 teachers, 1 ancillary helper, 1 cleaner _in_ charge,1 cook and a kitchen assistant. Each year we have a school outing to different places of interest and a school fete to raise money. We have a Hallowe'en Party, but we used to have a bonfire in a field across the road. Twice a week the Rector takes assembly and gives religious education.
